name: jira-test-case-generator
description: A Chrome extension that uses OpenAI's GPT-4o capabilities to generate Jira test cases from prompts and optional images.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -r manifest.json popup.html popup.js background.js images README.md dist/
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../jira-test-case-generator.zip * && cd ..
scripts.dev: echo 'Load the extension in Chrome by going to chrome://extensions/ and clicking Load unpacked, then select this directory.'

author: Eswar A
